Uses of Class
org.fluidity.foundation.Utility

  • Packages that use Utility 
    Package Description
    org.fluidity.composition
    Dependency injection container interface and supporting artifacts.
    org.fluidity.foundation
    Utilities to support basic tasks.

    • Uses of Utility in org.fluidity.composition

      Subclasses of Utility in org.fluidity.composition 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Components
      This utility is used to determine the component interfaces and group interfaces a class should be bound to when it is bound to a dependency injection container.
      class  Containers
      Static access to component containers.

    • Uses of Utility in org.fluidity.foundation

      Subclasses of Utility in org.fluidity.foundation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Archives
      Convenience methods to work with Java archives.
      static class  Archives.Cache
      Archives cache related functions.
      static class  Archives.Nested
      Convenience methods to handle nested Java archives.
      class  ClassLoaders
      Utility methods related to class loaders.
      class  Command
      Namespace for the various extensions of the Runnable concept, including the possibility to throw checked exceptions.
      class  Deferred
      Lazy instantiation with or without thread safety.
      class  Exceptions
      A utility that allows propagation of checked exceptions through method calls that don't allow those checked exceptions thrown from inside.
      class  Generics
      Utility methods to access parameterized type information.
      class  IOStreams
      General I/O stream related convenience methods.
      class  Lists
      Utilities related to arrays.
      class  Methods
      Convenience methods on methods.
      class  Proxies
      Convenience utilities concerning proxies.
      class  ServiceProviders
      Implements the Sun JDK service provider discovery.
      class  Strings
      Common string related utilities.
